trans-unit.resname: J13·1 | Swords to Plowshares | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swords to Plowshares
trans-unit.target: Swords to Plowshares

trans-unit.resname: J13·1 | Swords to Plowshares | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
trans-unit.target: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

trans-unit.resname: J13·1 | Swords to Plowshares | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.
trans-unit.target: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

trans-unit.resname: J13·2 | Bribery | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bribery
trans-unit.target: Bribery

trans-unit.resname: J13·2 | Bribery | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search target opponent's library for a creature card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles.
trans-unit.target: Search target opponent's library for a creature card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles.

trans-unit.resname: J13·3 | Imperial Recruiter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Imperial Recruiter
trans-unit.target: Imperial Recruiter

trans-unit.resname: J13·3 | Imperial Recruiter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with power 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with power 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: J13·4 | Crucible of Worlds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Crucible of Worlds
trans-unit.target: Crucible of Worlds

trans-unit.resname: J13·4 | Crucible of Worlds | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may play lands from your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: You may play lands from your graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: J13·4 | Crucible of Worlds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Amidst the darkest ashes grow the strongest seeds.
trans-unit.target: Amidst the darkest ashes grow the strongest seeds.

trans-unit.resname: J13·5 | Genesis | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Genesis
trans-unit.target: Genesis

trans-unit.resname: J13·5 | Genesis | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if CARDNAME is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, if CARDNAME is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

trans-unit.resname: J13·5 | Genesis | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "First through the Riftstone was Genesis—and the world was lifeless no more."\n—*Scroll of Beginnings*
trans-unit.target: "First through the Riftstone was Genesis—and the world was lifeless no more."\n—*Scroll of Beginnings*

trans-unit.resname: J13·6 | Overwhelming Forces | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Overwhelming Forces
trans-unit.target: Overwhelming Forces

trans-unit.resname: J13·6 | Overwhelming Forces | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.
trans-unit.target: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.

trans-unit.resname: J13·6 | Overwhelming Forces | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: By the year 208, Cao Cao commanded more than 1,000 experienced generals and a million infantry, cavalry, and naval troops.
trans-unit.target: By the year 208, Cao Cao commanded more than 1,000 experienced generals and a million infantry, cavalry, and naval troops.

trans-unit.resname: J13·7 | Vindicate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vindicate
trans-unit.target: Vindicate

trans-unit.resname: J13·7 | Vindicate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target permanent.
trans-unit.target: Destroy target permanent.

trans-unit.resname: J13·7 | Vindicate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I have seen entire civilizations rise and fall. You mortals are but dust to me."\n—Sorin Markov
trans-unit.target: "I have seen entire civilizations rise and fall. You mortals are but dust to me."\n—Sorin Markov

trans-unit.resname: J13·8 | Show and Tell | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Show and Tell
trans-unit.target: Show and Tell

trans-unit.resname: J13·8 | Show and Tell | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: Each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: J13·8 | Show and Tell | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: At the academy, "show and tell" too often becomes "run and hide."
trans-unit.target: At the academy, "show and tell" too often becomes "run and hide."
